feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add more metrics to workout graph by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/147
  • Check for more location options by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/148
  • Update all go dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/149
  • Move the time paused together with the total time by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/150
  • fix: call date in a different way from the Makefile to fix build error on macOS by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/154
  • Fix/dark map colors by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/155
  • Feature/speed map by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/156
  • Convert leaflet controls & tooltip to dark scheme by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/158
  • Fix the build time in Docker by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/159

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.14.3...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add equipment (or gear) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/161
  • Update screenshots by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/162
  • Fix the layout of the equipment details by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/163
  • Retry geocoding request to openstreetmap by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/164
  • Add even more debug output to reverse geocoding by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/165
  • Use our own reverse geocoding library by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/168
  • Add hiking as a workout type by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/169

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.15.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated German Translation by @dabenzel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/170
  • Fix disabling options in profile settings by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/171

New Contributors

  • @dabenzel made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/170

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.15.1...v1.15.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert screenshots to English by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/172
  • Add other types of workouts without location by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/174
  • Add more terms (with custom workouts) and the Dutch translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/177
  • New language: Italian by @lukasitaly in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/176

New Contributors

  • @lukasitaly made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/176

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.15.2...v1.16.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add online translation notes and badges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/179
  • Translated using Weblate (French) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/180
  • Translated using Weblate (Italian) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/181
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/182

New Contributors

  • @weblate made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.0...v1.16.1
